text: Taylor Swift was introduced to her'charismatic'new man by close friend Emma Stone, who is currently filming in Britain with the actor. The La La Land actress is working alongside Joe Alwyn in The Favourite - a film about the reign of Queen Anne. She played matchmaker to global megastar Swift and the relatively unknown Alwyn, 26, who have been secretly dating for several months.
